h3.span: *The next regular meeting of the Clancy School Board is May 14th, 2020 @ 5:30 p.m.*

hr.h2: As directed by Governor Bullock, Clancy School will remain closed through April 24th, 2020.
hr.h3: Packet Pickup for those needing them is Monday, April 20th from 8:30-3:30. If you need an alternate time, please call the school during regular school hours to make arrangements.

h3.span: Most importantly, thank you for being patient and understanding as we navigate this situation. We will do our best to communicate to our community as new information is available.

div.hr: Standing for excellence and integrity is our goal. Click here for more information about our academic community.
In case you run into any questions, check out our policy and forms information..
Click here for an expanded view.

div.div: 18 Clancy Creek Rd | P.O. Box 209 | Clancy, Mt 59634 | Phone: (406) 933-5531| Fax: (406) 933-5715 | Login
